  • Constructor Details

    • SingleGameServer

      public SingleGameServer​(java.net.Socket p1, java.net.Socket p2) throws java.io.IOException
      Initializes the SingleGameServer Object
      Parameters:
      p1 - : Socket of client one which will be handled by PlayerThread object player1
      p2 - : Socket of client one which will be handled by PlayerThread object player1
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

  • Method Details

    • announcementOfLeftToP1

      public void announcementOfLeftToP1()
      Warn player1 thread when the client handled by player2 thread is left the game. Does the required parameter changes for it as well.

    • announcementOfLeftToP2

      public void announcementOfLeftToP2()
      Warn player2 thread when the client handled by player1 thread is left the game. Does the required parameter changes for it as well.

    • run

      public void run()
      Specified by:
      run in interface java.lang.Runnable
      Overrides:
      run in class java.lang.Thread

    • establishTheGame

      public void establishTheGame()
      Declare the initial parameters for the game. Shuffle and distribute cards, reset the round etc.

    • isInteger

      public static boolean isInteger​(java.lang.String s)
      Check if the entered answer of the client is integer, when a card indicator is being waited.
      Parameters:
      s - : string entered by client
      Returns:
      true if integer, false otherwise

    • playTheRound

      public void playTheRound​(int c1, int c2)
      Refresh the card list of the clients, removes the played cards, and assign card groups again. Calls compareCards method to compare real values of played cards.
      Parameters:
      c1 - : index of the card sent by client1
      c2 - : index of the card sent by client2

    • compareCards

      public void compareCards​(int card1, int card2)
      Compares the real values of played cards, increases the points accordingly, and announces the results of rounds. Calls finishGame method if the last round is played.
      Parameters:
      card1 - : index of card played by client1
      card2 - : index of card played by client1

    • listToString

      public static java.lang.String listToString​(java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> list)
      Parameters:
      list - : list of cards
      Returns:
      the string expression of the card list, makes the places of the played cards space.
